about_the_game:
This is a collection of monster assets suitable for use in RPG Maker MV and RPG Maker MZ with pop-style illustrations that fits well with different types of assets.
The set includes a range of creatures, such as wolves, bats, medusas, and other demons that dwell within dungeons.

■This collection includes 11 monsters, each available in 4 different color variations and 2 different sizes, allowing for various customization possibilities.

■This is a project to commemorate the 20th anniversary of the pixel art monster asset site 【RPG dot】.
We are excited to have your ongoing support for 【R dot】 in the future!


-----------------------------------------------------------------------

【Contents】

・Slime (Fizzy)
・Cube slime
・Wolf
・Bats
・Will-o'-wisp
・Mimic
・Lantern Witch
・Rattlesnake
・Lamia
・Medusa
・Golem
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
